title: Dirty Sinks, Cigarettes To The Rescue! 4.2.20
itunes:title: Dirty Sinks, Cigarettes To The Rescue! 4.2.20
description:
In episode 600, Jack, Miles, and Jamie are joined by Night Call podcast's Molly Lambert to discuss Pinterest questions, how pandemics shape human history, who is being left behind in this pandemic, Big Tobacco trying to save our lungs, Netflix numbers being released, Wayne Brady's quarantine situation, fun quarantine activities, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. “I’m gonna make you my favorite Cosmopolitan and you probably have all the ingredients right in your house. So you need a big pitcher ‘cause I like to make a lot of Cosmos. You never know who’s gonna stop by. Wait a minute... no one’s stopping by.” - Ina Garten, 9:30AM
  2. PINTEREST Quarantine Questions ... HOW DO I CLEAN MY BATHROOM SINK?!?
  3. Pandemics and the Shape of Human History
  4. Left Behind
  5. Celebrity Culture Is Burning
  6. British American Tobacco working on plant-based coronavirus vaccine
  7. Could tobacco cure coronavirus? Don’t laugh.
  8. Big Tobacco Is Donating Ventilators for Coronavirus. Seriously.
  9. Smoking or Vaping May Increase the Risk of a Severe Coronavirus Infection
  10. People Are Watching An Incredible Amount Of ‘The Office’ On Netflix While Self-Isolating
  11. One Celebrity Is Bravely Quarantined With His Ex & Her New Boyfriend
  12. WATCH: The Budos Band "Up From The South"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
